QuestData.Title: The Dunes of Silithus
QuestData.Description: Cenarion Hold, in Silithus, is one of the biggest druid settlements in Kalimdor. Almost as big as Moonglade, mon.$b$bSomeday, maybe Zen'Aliri be headin' on over to Cenarion Hold... fightin' some Twilight's Hammer, healin' the land where the silithid tear it... but Zen'Aliri's master tells him to wait.$b$bSo Zen'Aliri waits.$b$bThe easiest way to get there is that path up Un'Goro Crater's northwestern cliffs.$b$bIf you got no master... there's nothing keepin' you from movin' on.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.
